programme.title: Grill These Sandwiches
programme.desc: Mad Good Food Host Derrell Smith joins Chef Dale Talde at the grill as they cook up some stupendous sandwiches including a Salmon Pastrami Reuben, a Meatball Banh Mi, and even some Grilled Ice Cream Sandwiches.

programme.title: New Orleans-Style Shrimp And Oysters
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings us to the bayou as he creates a NOLA-inspired menu complete with Chargrilled Oysters, Black Pepper Shrimp Poboys, finishes it off with Bananas Foster, and washes it all down with a Fruity Grilled Hurricane.

programme.title: Sunday Vietnamese Brisket with Noodles
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde shows us how he does Sunday up right as he grills up some Vietnamese Brisket with Rice Noodles, Crispy Swordfish Summer Rolls, and tops it all off with some tasty Soju Floats. Hey, its Sunday somewhere, right?

programme.title: 4th of July Remixed
programme.desc: Its 4th of July and Chef Dale is ready to celebrate by grilling up his takes on summer bbq classics, like his galbi smash double cheeseburger with kimchi special sauce, honey butter steak fries, and char sui bbq ribs.

programme.title: Its Taco Time
programme.desc: Tacos are the way to Chef Dales heart, and to prove it, hes grilling up a sweet and smoky lemongrass and guajillo pork with pineapple, served with coconut and cotija cheese corn and an avocado jicama salad.

programme.title: Restaurant-Style Whole Roast Fish
programme.desc: Grilling isnt only about fast and casual dinners. Chef Dale grills to impress with this elegant, restaurant quality meal of whole roasted fish, coconut milk grits, and snow pea, watermelon and tamarind salad.

programme.title: The Chicken Episode
programme.desc: If youre going to grill chicken, youll want to make it good. Chef Dale likes to kick up the heat with his angry chicken, a spicy, spatchcocked and grilled whole chicken, and his kung pao chicken wings.

programme.title: Brunch On The Grill
programme.desc: Wake up, its time to grill! Chef Dale greets the day with a showstopping dutch baby pancake and tangerine syrup, crispy hash browns topped with creme fraiche and roe, and a ham steak smothered in sweet cherry mostarda and red eye gravy.

programme.title: Vegetables, But Delicious
programme.desc: Grilling is the perfect way to imbue your veggies with deliciousness. Chef Dale crafts a family style platter of trumpet mushrooms, eggplant marinated in spicy ssam jang, and charred yellow squash served with a green goddess dressing.

programme.title: Kabobs and Skewers
programme.desc: Kabobs and skewers are a family tradition for Chef Dale. This Mediterranean-inspired meal features beef and shrimp kabobs with grilled tomatoes, potatoes, and eggplant, all served on warm pita with a tangy white sauce.

programme.title: End of Summer Seafood Feast
programme.desc: The end of summer is near, and Chef Dale goes out in style with a giant seafood feast! Lobster, crab, clams, shrimp, and scallops, all served directly on the table with plenty of buttery garlic bread. Thanks for watching, and until we grill again!

programme.title: Apocalypse Burgers
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks the summer off right with a burger blowout featuring Brisket Burgers with Grilled Onions and Blue Cheese, Shrimp Burgers with XO Sauce and a Fried Egg, and Lamb Sliders with Feta Ranch and dont forget the Lemon Oregano Fries.

programme.title: Sausage Egg And Cheese All Day Long
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings out the best of brunch with sweet and savory hits such as Bacon Wrapped Dates Stuffed with Chorizo, Maple Sausage, Egg, And Cheese Fried Rice, and the tastiest BBQ Duck, Egg, And Corn Scallion Pancake Sandwiches youve ever eaten.

programme.title: Summer Surf n Turf
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks lobster And steak to the curb as he puts a Spanish-style spin on your typical surf n turf by creating Pork And Clams, Lobster and Mushroom Fideos, and Tomato And Tuna Bread then washing it all down with a tasty Michelada.

programme.title: Perfectly Prepared Steaks
programme.desc: Big Daddy Dale Talde shows you how to marinate, prep, And grill up the biggest and best steaks out there. From a Hanger Steak with Salsa Verde to a Ribeye with Ginger Chili Relish, and tops it all off with the father of all steaks The Porterhouse.

programme.title: Pizza Slice, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill throws a pizza party with her delicious homemade pies! She creates a sweet and savory pie with spicy pepperoni And pineapple, a tangy BBQ chicken pizza, a grandma deep dish pie with mozzarella And chorizo, and an herby salad flatbread.

programme.title: Plantains and Rice, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill celebrates Hispanic Heritage Month with her moms recipes as well as some of her own. Shell whip up a coconut coquito cocktail, Cuban-style black beans, a garlicky arroz con pollo with sofrito, and some salty and sweet plantains.

programme.title: Loaded Dogs And Classic Cocktails in San Diego
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to San Diego to sample a modern spin on classic deli fare, heavily loaded low-riding hot dogs, frosty And fruity Taiwanese snow ice, and fancy French cocktails from a rotating carousel bar.

programme.title: Brooklyns Best Pizza Tour
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza goes on the best pizza party crawl that Brooklyn has to offer. Hell try a Neo-Neapolitan pie, a classic coal oven favorite, hell hit up a modern joint with innovative toppings, and a cozy Italian-owned neighborhood spot.

programme.title: Smash Burgers And A Slice in Los Angeles
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to all the buzzworthy spots in LA - cooking up calamari steak at a classic Mexican joint, tasting taro root donuts with fun flavors, grabbing a guanciale slice, and hopping on the line to make cheesy scrumptious smash burgers.

programme.title: Tacos, Brats, And Biscuits in Austin
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza goes down south to try Austins best bets - breakfast tacos are on the itinerary, as well as a bangin beer garden And sausage house, loaded biscuits, and dessert pancakes to boot! Austin may be weird but the food is fabulous.

programme.title: BBQ Bowls And Puffy Tacos in San Antonio
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza gets his spurs on to sample San Antonios best all-day brunch, taste some epic puffy tacos at a classic car joint, create colorful conchitas, and bask in the beauty of BBQ Thai curry bowls.

programme.title: Pierogies, Bagels, and Ramen in NYC
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza takes a LOT of bites out of the big apple as he samples warm pillowy bagels And schmear, grabs pierogies at an old school Ukrainian spot, gets the scoop on innovative ice cream flavors, and slurps up some real ramen.

programme.title: Dumplings, Steam Buns, and Dim Sum, Oh My!
programme.desc: In a city with over 60 Michelin star restaurants, one brother will live and dine like a king, while the other will check out the citys more affordable street food scene.

programme.title: Simplicity vs. Splendor on the Seaside
programme.desc: Soaking in the beauty and elegance of the French Riviera, Marko and Alex are in Nice to enjoy the simplicity and splendor of this seaside city.

programme.title: Keep Austin Weird
programme.desc: In the state capital of Texas, Marko and Alex see what Austin has to offer. An eclectic city known for its music and cuisine, the guys brave the Texas heat and check out what keeps Austin weird.

programme.title: Levels of Luxury in Laos
programme.desc: Sandwiched between Thailand, Vietnam, and Cambodia, Laos is a destination often overlooked by tourists. Marko and Alex are uncovering the hidden gem of Vientiane, the capital city, to see what goes on in this sleepy town beside the Mekong River.

programme.title: The Gainful Grace of Geneva
programme.desc: Marko and Alex find themselves in the prosperous and pristine city of Geneva, Switzerland. A city nestled alongside a beautiful glacier-fed lake, the guys will explore the riches Geneva has to offer.

programme.title: The Thriving Traditions of Taipei
programme.desc: Welcome to the buzzing capital of Taiwan. A rich blend of cultures, old meets new in this thriving metropolis of Taipei. Marko and Alex eat their way through the city, experiencing some unique traditions along the way.

programme.title: The Lions Share of Lyon
programme.desc: Marko and Alex head to Lyon, France, a city known for its gastronomy and endless history.

programme.title: Oceanside in Okinawa
programme.desc: Ocean breeze, turquoise waters and a whole lot of amazing cuisine. Marko and Alex are soaking up that island life in Okinawa, Japan and learning what makes it so unique.

programme.title: Genoa From Above and Below
programme.desc: In Genoa, the brothers cruise the streets, while one of them gets a taste for the lavish lifestyle of Italys Northwestern port. They take in all the views: heads in the clouds on a high-flying funicular, and just above water at the local aquarium.

programme.title: The L.A. Lifestyle
programme.desc: Green juice, avocado toast, and surfers galore. Marko and Alex are back home in Los Angeles to explore their town, staycation style. From downtown to the beach, the guys do everything fun under the sun in the city of angels.

programme.title: Cubanos, Empanadas, And Smoked Beef Rib in Miami
programme.desc: Frankie goes to Miami to sample serious cherry smoked beef rib, three cheese spinach empanadas, and a legendary Cubano sandwich with homemade mustard.

programme.title: Chiles, Burgers, And Tenderloins in Santa Fe
programme.desc: Frankie heads to Santa Fe investigating New Mexican cuisines eating green chili burgers, poblano chile stews, and sweet blue-corn pancakes.

programme.title: BBQ, Pizza, And Noodles in Nashville
programme.desc: Frankie visits Nashville for smoky BBQ Pork, hand-pulled noodles, a luxe burger, and hand-pulled noodles.

programme.title: Salmon Tacos, Meatballs, And Perogies in Las Vegas
programme.desc: Frankie dazzles in Las Vegas where he enjoys crunchy salmon skin tacos, an homage to afterschool snacks, and the dish that put Martha Stewart on the map.

programme.title: Pho, Poke, And Pig in Oahu
programme.desc: Frankie explores Hawaiis Oahu island to get nourished from fresh tuna poke, heartfelt Pho, and hand-pounded poi.

programme.title: Quail, Alligator Sausage, And Gumbo in New Orleans
programme.desc: Frankie stops by New Orleans to chow down on lacquered quail, a beast of a Po Boy, and Creole Beef Daube.

programme.title: Smash Burgers And A Slice in Los Angeles
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to all the buzzworthy spots in LA - cooking up calamari steak at a classic Mexican joint, tasting taro root donuts with fun flavors, grabbing a guanciale slice, and hopping on the line to make cheesy scrumptious smash burgers.

programme.title: Trick or Treats for Kids
programme.desc: Whether you have kids or are a kid at heart, these whimsical Halloween treats are delicious, easy bakes. From leftover Halloween candy bark to ghosty treats and monster cakes. These recipes are perfect to make with little ones.

programme.title: Spooktacular Tricks and Treats
programme.desc: Dont let the line of trick-or-treaters or the candy corn overload scare you out of the kitchen this Halloween. Frankies got tricks up his sleeve to make simple yet wicked good treats for everyone at the party to enjoy. All while saving some dough.

programme.title: Sweater Weather
programme.desc: The air is crisp and the leaves are changing, which means its time to gather round the dinner table for hearty, seasonal meals on a budget. These warm dishes are sure to keep you cozy all season long.

programme.title: BBQ Bowls And Puffy Tacos in San Antonio
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza gets his spurs on to sample San Antonios best all-day brunch, taste some epic puffy tacos at a classic car joint, create colorful conchitas, and bask in the beauty of BBQ Thai curry bowls.

programme.title: We Knead Pizza
programme.desc: Cancel the pizza delivery, its time to save money and build your pies from scratch. With three different pizza styles, youre bound to find one that satisfies your craving without digging into your wallet.

programme.title: Oktoberfest
programme.desc: Join Frankie as he shares his budget friendly takes on Oktoberfest-inspired dishes, perfect for celebrating the fall season with friends. These festive and hearty meals will keep you cozy and full, and best of all, pair nicely with a beer.

programme.title: Tacos, Brats, And Biscuits in Austin
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza goes down south to try Austins best bets - breakfast tacos are on the itinerary, as well as a bangin beer garden And sausage house, loaded biscuits, and dessert pancakes to boot! Austin may be weird but the food is fabulous.

programme.title: What Say You
programme.desc: Ikuti perbincangan pelbagai topik berkaitan isu-isu semasa bersama tetamu jemputan.

programme.title: Running Man

programme.title: Big Band Project

programme.title: Dream Girl

programme.title: The Spies

programme.title: Peninsula

programme.title: Swing Kids

programme.title: Ordinary Person

programme.title: No Mercy

programme.title: The Whistleblower

programme.title: Ordinary People

programme.title: Single in Seoul
programme.desc: Yeong-Ho is a famous influencer who praises living a single life. Hyeon-Jin is an editor who is desperate about finding her partner. The two meets while working together for a book.

programme.title: Unforgettable
programme.desc: A radio DJ receives a letter written 23 years ago in the past. Through the letter, the story of his first love and friendships of five friends are revealed.

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: A man who became a suspect in a closed-door murder seeks help from an attorney to prove him innocent. As they begin to piece the puzzle together, the truth slowly reverses.

programme.title: Dr. Cheon and the Lost Talisman
programme.desc: Dr. Cheon is a fake exorcist who cannot see or hear any ghosts. One day, a woman comes to Dr. Cheon, asking him to save her possessed younger sister...

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E073
programme.desc: Hilario quiere ir con Nicols a buscar a Federico y Fernanda, furiosa, advierte a su medio hermano que no va a venderle Cantarrana como quiere para que aprenda a vivir como el don nadie que es. Victoria le confa a Clementina que sabe que si Federico mato a Leopoldo fue por cosas que ella hizo y eso la haca sentir que tena una deuda con el, pero ahora no le debe nada porque le salvo la vida; sin embargo, ella est consciente de que los Del Casal y ella son enemigos a muerte y solo le queda esperar cul ser el proximo muerto en esa guerra.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E074
programme.desc: La sorpresa se apodera de Nicols cuando Victoria, para demostrarle que ella es tan malvada como el cree y darle una razon para odiarla, admite haber matado a Leopoldo Alcoy. Fernanda contrata a Grillo, un hombre que se va a encargar de secuestrar a Hilario para darle una buena paliza; Leopoldo sabe que tiene que darle explicaciones a su familia de los motivos que tuvo para desaparecer, pero primero quiere conversar a solas con Federico sobre lo ocurrido. Victoria le confa a Clementina que le dijo a Nicols que fue ella quien mato a Leopoldo porque est convencida de que ni un milagro va a acabar con el odio entre ellos.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E83
programme.desc: Camila est a punto de dejar su venganza; e irse con Max pero al saber del regreso de Rosa Blanco, cambia su decision. Ezequiel, iracundo hace preparar una cena ntima, solo con Camila, donde comprobar el engao y la traicion.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E84
programme.desc: Al encontrar a Max y Camila abrazados, Octavia le pide a Camila que deje a Ezequiel pes ella lo ama. Camila, rechaza esa peticion pes interfiere en sus planes e intereses. En un juego de palabras con Camila, Ezequiel trata de desenmascarar la traicion.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E103
programme.desc: Israel demands Pastora to open the door to the room; although he hears his brother on the other side.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E104
programme.desc: In the best of performances, Pastora swears she doesnt mind going to jail as long as Raul is safe.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E103
programme.desc: Judge Echeverri calls the jury to deliberate to give the verdict in the case against Lorena. Malena is upset because she knows she will have to be away from Jose Pablo, but she also fears for what might happen to him in jail - Lorena goes to the Corona house for her son; but there she also meets Alberto.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E79
programme.desc: Adriana trata de convencer a Carlos para que se den una nueva oportunidad pero el est convencido de que no la merece y se marcha.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E80
programme.desc: Los Perroni se impresionan ante lo ordinarios que son los miembros de la familia Chaparro, con quienes tendrn que compartir su casa debido a la exigencias de Adriana.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E81
programme.desc: Angustiados porque la polica no ha podido dar con el paradero de Azalea y la nia, Adriana y Cesar regresan a la casa Palacios, donde descubren que Carlos Ral los espera.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E074
programme.desc: La sorpresa se apodera de Nicols cuando Victoria, para demostrarle que ella es tan malvada como el cree y darle una razon para odiarla, admite haber matado a Leopoldo Alcoy. Fernanda contrata a Grillo, un hombre que se va a encargar de secuestrar a Hilario para darle una buena paliza; Leopoldo sabe que tiene que darle explicaciones a su familia de los motivos que tuvo para desaparecer, pero primero quiere conversar a solas con Federico sobre lo ocurrido. Victoria le confa a Clementina que le dijo a Nicols que fue ella quien mato a Leopoldo porque est convencida de que ni un milagro va a acabar con el odio entre ellos.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E075
programme.desc: Nicols se siente avergonzado cuando Victoria le enumera todas las veces que ha credo en el a pesar de todo; sin embargo, esta vez, ella no est dispuesta a perdonarle tanta injusticia. Yosmir se niega a terminar su relacion con Eugenia por complacer a Yajaira. Florencia se impresiona cuando Nicols, aparte de revelarle que Leopoldo sigue con vida y fue Federico quien le disparo, termina su relacion con ella. La ilusion de Hansen de poder lograr que Adelaida corresponda a su amor aumenta cuando la mujer admite que est abriendose a la posibilidad de amarlo. Fernanda promete a Nicols que le va a devolver Cantarrana a los Guanipa siempre y cuando el se case con Florencia Guanipa esa misma semana.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E84
programme.desc: Al encontrar a Max y Camila abrazados, Octavia le pide a Camila que deje a Ezequiel pes ella lo ama. Camila, rechaza esa peticion pes interfiere en sus planes e intereses. En un juego de palabras con Camila, Ezequiel trata de desenmascarar la traicion.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E85
programme.desc: Max besa a Camila y le ruega que huyan juntos. Son sorprendidos por Ezequiel quien con odio pone un arma en la frente de su hijo, lo golpea. Fausto le da las ltimas instrucciones a Anton de eliminar a Ezequiel pero Torrealba llega. Culmina la boda. Se oye un disparo.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E104
programme.desc: In the best of performances, Pastora swears she doesnt mind going to jail as long as Raul is safe.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E105
programme.desc: In tears, Illis assures Pastora that she only feels sorry for her; the enraged woman shoots in all directions.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E104
programme.desc: They are alone together and Alberto insists on knowing who killed his father, because he still doesnt believe her. Hurt, he claims all the damage she did to him and challenges her to prove the truth she speaks of. The Chief of Police informs Omar of a movement that drug traffickers are making with medical instruments and equipment, apparently to make a change of face.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E105
programme.desc: Alberto goes to see Claudio in his cell and complains about his cowardice, demanding to know who killed Marco Aurelio. Claudio insists that Lorena did it and Alberto presses him to tell him if there is someone else involved, but Claudio protects Gertrudis while denying that he was the one who fired the gun - Mara Lourdes offers Patricia as a last negotiation before going to a new trial, 12 years in prison for Malena and 6 years for Isabel - Lorena locates and meets Paco in a cafe in the city.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E076 - Episodio 76
programme.desc: A Nicols le parece increble que Fernanda le este pidiendo que se case con Florencia a cambio de devolverle Cantarrana a los Guanipa; la seora le sugiere que aproveche la oportunidad porque, si no lo hace, se va a quedar sin Victoria y sin la ltima posibilidad de regresarle la felicidad. Hilario evidencia ante Florencia lo mal que est porque siente que no sabe querer a nadie; ella, por su parte, est destrozada por haber terminado con Nicols; por primera vez Guanipa admite no estar en capacidad de ofrecerle nada a la joven. Felipe le confa a Nicols que el querer ayudar a Antonieta a salir de su depresion solo ha empeorado las cosas porque ella se est ilusionando; Del Casal, por su parte, le revela a su amigo que va a casarse con Florencia porque esa es la nica manera de poder devolverle a Victoria un pedazo de la felicidad que el le quito.

programme.desc: Adriana logra llevarse a Tatianita mientras Carlos Ral queda enfrentndose a los delincuentes por defender a su madre.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E075
programme.desc: Nicols se siente avergonzado cuando Victoria le enumera todas las veces que ha credo en el a pesar de todo; sin embargo, esta vez, ella no est dispuesta a perdonarle tanta injusticia. Yosmir se niega a terminar su relacion con Eugenia por complacer a Yajaira. Florencia se impresiona cuando Nicols, aparte de revelarle que Leopoldo sigue con vida y fue Federico quien le disparo, termina su relacion con ella. La ilusion de Hansen de poder lograr que Adelaida corresponda a su amor aumenta cuando la mujer admite que est abriendose a la posibilidad de amarlo. Fernanda promete a Nicols que le va a devolver Cantarrana a los Guanipa siempre y cuando el se case con Florencia Guanipa esa misma semana.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E076 - Episodio 76
programme.desc: A Nicols le parece increble que Fernanda le este pidiendo que se case con Florencia a cambio de devolverle Cantarrana a los Guanipa; la seora le sugiere que aproveche la oportunidad porque, si no lo hace, se va a quedar sin Victoria y sin la ltima posibilidad de regresarle la felicidad. Hilario evidencia ante Florencia lo mal que est porque siente que no sabe querer a nadie; ella, por su parte, est destrozada por haber terminado con Nicols; por primera vez Guanipa admite no estar en capacidad de ofrecerle nada a la joven. Felipe le confa a Nicols que el querer ayudar a Antonieta a salir de su depresion solo ha empeorado las cosas porque ella se est ilusionando; Del Casal, por su parte, le revela a su amigo que va a casarse con Florencia porque esa es la nica manera de poder devolverle a Victoria un pedazo de la felicidad que el le quito.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E85
programme.desc: Max besa a Camila y le ruega que huyan juntos. Son sorprendidos por Ezequiel quien con odio pone un arma en la frente de su hijo, lo golpea. Fausto le da las ltimas instrucciones a Anton de eliminar a Ezequiel pero Torrealba llega. Culmina la boda. Se oye un disparo.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E86
programme.desc: Total caos en la iglesia despues del disparo. Max herido. Ezequiel, la toma del brazo y la aleja de all, aunque siente pesar por su hijo. Fausto y Roger son los protagonistas de este asesinato frustrado. Ezequiel y Camila se dicen crudas verdades.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E105
programme.desc: In tears, Illis assures Pastora that she only feels sorry for her; the enraged woman shoots in all directions.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E106
programme.desc: Baudilio, out of his mind, tries to hang Pastora while demanding that the woman confess to him if she murdered Misael.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E105
programme.desc: Alberto goes to see Claudio in his cell and complains about his cowardice, demanding to know who killed Marco Aurelio. Claudio insists that Lorena did it and Alberto presses him to tell him if there is someone else involved, but Claudio protects Gertrudis while denying that he was the one who fired the gun - Mara Lourdes offers Patricia as a last negotiation before going to a new trial, 12 years in prison for Malena and 6 years for Isabel - Lorena locates and meets Paco in a cafe in the city.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E106
programme.desc: Malena and Alfonso are ready to get married, and Alberto will be one of their witnesses. Unable to contain himself any longer, Ricardo interrupts the meeting between Don Lucio and Mara Bonita, wanting to know what they are discussing. Lorena confronts Norma, connects the dots, and realizes that she might be the key to uncovering Gertrudis.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E81
programme.desc: Angustiados porque la polica no ha podido dar con el paradero de Azalea y la nia, Adriana y Cesar regresan a la casa Palacios, donde descubren que Carlos Ral los espera.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E82
programme.desc: Adriana logra llevarse a Tatianita mientras Carlos Ral queda enfrentndose a los delincuentes por defender a su madre.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E075
programme.desc: Nicols se siente avergonzado cuando Victoria le enumera todas las veces que ha credo en el a pesar de todo; sin embargo, esta vez, ella no est dispuesta a perdonarle tanta injusticia. Yosmir se niega a terminar su relacion con Eugenia por complacer a Yajaira. programme.title: Dropped - S01:E02 - On Top Of The World
programme.desc: Chris and Casey trudge through a bunch of streams, wade through long patches of soggy muskeg, and climb a mountain while searching for a big caribou bull. During the journey, Chris hurts his knee again, making him wonder if hell be able to continue the hunt.

programme.title: Dropped - S01:E03 - Down The River
programme.desc: The guys head downstream looking for Yukon Bull Moose, spending two days traveling nearly 20 miles along the river. Chris and Casey keep going until they set up their moose camp. The new spot is a bit unsettling because they hear a grizzly just outside their tent.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E01 - Volcanoes
programme.desc: The Greatest Show on Earth is also the most ferocious. Desperate Hours looks at the destructive force of volcanoes and examines the eruptions in Montserrat which devastated half a Caribbean Island, the 1973 eruption on the Icelandic island of Heimaey, the 2010 eruption Eyjafjallajokull which blocked air travel in Europe, the Merapi eruption in Indonesia, and Mount Nyiragongo in Congo, and the super-volcano in Yellowstone.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E02 - Earthquake
programme.desc: When the Earth really moves, it means disaster on an epic scale. Desperate Hours looks at the destructive force of earthquakes and looks at the 2015 Kathmandu earthquake in Nepal, the 2008 Sichuan earthquake in China where an estimated 10,000 children were trapped in collapsed school buildings, a 1960 Puerto Mont earthquake in Chile, the 2010 Port-au-Princ earthquake in Haiti, and the 2005 Kashmir earthquake in Pakistan.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E03 - Epidemic
programme.desc: Desperate Hours looks at major epidemics including the African Ebola outbreak in Sudan which eventually led to cases in the United State and England, the Indian Smallpox outbreak in Bihar, the African Cholera outbreak, the SARS outbreak in Guanghzhou China, and the Bird Flu of Hong Kong.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E04 - Wind
programme.desc: Desperate Hours looks at the destructive power of wind. From the devastating power of Hurricane Katrina in New Orleans to the destructive Cyclone Nargis in Myanmar, the 1960 storm Hurricane Donna in Florida, Tornado Joplin in Missouri, and Hurricane Sandy in New York.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E05 - Fire
programme.desc: The blazing terror of a fire can match anything in creation for sheer menace. Desperate Hours looks at the destructive force of fires including the Black Saturday Bushfires in Victoria Australia, the Station Nightclub fire in Rhode Island, the LInnovation Department Store fire in Brussels Belgium, the Armoury fire in Lagos Nigeria, and the Binhai New Development Zone Fire in Tianjin China.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E01 - Into the High Lonesome
programme.desc: Laramy Sasquatch Miller sets off on The Trail with his trusty horse 7, to test his survival skills and pay homage to mountain men of the past. Saying goodbye to his family, Laramy and 7 have to battle the elements, build shelter, live off of the land, and survive a 30-day trek through the backcountry.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E02 - Camp Otis
programme.desc: Modern-day mountain man Laramy Miller sets out on the trail to experience life in the high lonesome.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E04 - Elizabeth At 80 Continuity And Change
programme.desc: Thanks to the Queens dedication, Britain found a way to move past its empire days and create a successful new identity, surprising many experts. This is the story of an amazing woman and her amazing life.

programme.title: Dropped - S05:E09 - Head to Head
programme.desc: With the arctic storm nipping at their heals, the Keefer brothers race down the river to reach their next supply-yielding cache only to become lost as the river divides into a maze of small channels.

programme.title: Dropped - S05:E10 - Edge of the Storm
programme.desc: As the temperature plummets, the Keefer brothers fight their way down stream through freezing water and strong headwinds as they hope to reach their extraction site before the arctic storm lays claim to it.

programme.title: Wardens - S02:E09 - Operation Moonshine
programme.desc: Montana game wardens try to catch suspects who illegally kill animals. Also, one of the wardens gets a chance to pause from enforcing hunting rules and goes on a mule deer hunt for himself.

programme.title: Backcountry Rescue - S01:E08 - No Short Cuts
programme.desc: Tim demands a lot of everyone around him, especially during a cave rescue, which he describes as the worst kind of rescue.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle - S01:E01 - Introduction to Military Special Forces
programme.desc: "Special Operations" are special divisions of military, police or intelligence services that are highly qualified in specific areas of urban warfare and in a variety of special weapons and technology.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S04:E07 - Swimming with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Manny swims with giant gulf sturgeon on the Suwanee River.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S04:E08 - Snapping Turtles of the Santa Fe
programme.desc: Manny explores the Santa Fe River in search of alligator, snapping turtles And other wildlife.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S02:E01 - At All Costs
programme.desc: Ivan goes on a journey to save his friends nineteen rhinos from the poaching epidemic now sweeping through South Africa. The solution: a logistical nightmare of transporting the entire herd to a secure location 600 miles across the country.

programme.desc: Chris and Casey Keefer recount their most memorable moments from this years journey to Alaskas Brooks Range.

programme.title: Dropped - S05:E12 - The Keefer Brothers
programme.desc: The Keefer brothers look back on one of their favorite moments of this years adventure.

programme.title: Wardens - S02:E10 - Operation Big Horn
programme.desc: Have you ever been curious about what happens to seized trophy animals? Well show you today. Join game wardens as they keep an eye on hunting activities involving big horn sheep. Flathead Lake is bursting with festive vibes during the 4th of July. Lets make sure it stays safe.

programme.title: Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots - S01:E01 - Meet Island Air
programme.desc: Thousands of outdoor adventure seekers flock to Kodiak Island to experience the wilds of Alaska through hunting, fishing and wildlife viewing expeditions, and Island Air Service makes those once-in-a-lifetime quests a reality. Flying in fog, rain, snow or sleet and moving outdoorsmen, locals, supplies and materials to the farthest corners of the island, Its all in a days run for a Kodiak bush pilot and the staff and crew of Island Air.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle - S01:E02 - Introduction to Police Special Operations
programme.desc: As warfare has evolved, many military techniques and technologies have been adapted for use in urban settings by police units around the world. This episode provides viewers with an intimate perspective on what it feels like to be "inside the heads" of special police personnel, and how their use of military-style strategies and equipment allows them to save lives. From riot control in South Africa and the lessons learned from its excesses, to Los Angeles Police Chief Robert Gates creation of an elite police S.W.A.T team, CQB will showcase how, over the past 30 years, the fight against urban crime has evolved into a military scenario, with both sides using increasingly complex weaponry and tactics.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S04:E09 - Wild Boars, Wild Nights Part 1
programme.desc: Manny hunts wild eurasian boars with a spear, both day and night. Oh - and Manny gets bitten by his best friend!

programme.title: Savage Wild - S04:E10 - Wild Boars, Wild Nights Part 2
programme.desc: Bring out the dogs! Manny learns the most effective way to hunt wild boar.

programme.desc: Investigating a string of murdered lions, Ivan gets to the very heart of an ancient conflict between humans and lions. The outcome will test Ivans own core values about cultural

programme.title: The Marry Me Pact
programme.desc: Charlotte and Rory are best friends, and for his 30th he goes travelling around the world. A year later, Charlotte visits a psychic who tells her she is destined to be with Rory when he gets home. Rory comes home...but engaged.

programme.title: Danger Rocks the Cradle
programme.desc: Nicolette, a high school senior has bounced around from foster home to home. She started feeling hopeless when found herself pregnant by the school quarterback.

programme.title: Love on the Reef
programme.desc: A smart and serious marine biologist and a fun-loving and laissez-faire dive instructor must team up to save their beloved reef from being destroyed before its too late.

programme.title: Snowkissed
programme.desc: A travel-averse journalist chases her dream assignment, where she soon finds herself mentoring a handsome BAndB owner who wants to be a tour guide.

programme.title: Mr. Pawsitively Perfect
programme.desc: An aspiring marketing designers favorite foster dog is adopted by a famous but down on his luck furniture designer, whom she fears only wants the dog for his new image.

programme.title: Just for Showmance
programme.desc: Follows Tara Thompson whose presenting career starts to stall, and agrees to go on a TV show to marry her perfect match, Joe, a man shes never met. But she secretly tries to track him down to clarify that the marriage is just for show.

programme.title: Modeled with Love
programme.desc: When model-maker Olivias dad is set to retire from their firm, she believes shes the obvious pick to take over. Enter Simon, whose big picture thinking threatens to upend Olivias comfortable bubble along with her role as successor.

programme.title: The Love Advisor
programme.desc: Abby works as an assistant and writer of the popular podcast run by her former college friend Serena. Journalist comes from NYC to write about podcast and Serena. Abby starts to develop feelings, but Serena already has a plan for herself.

programme.title: The Wedding Contest
programme.desc: When a couple cant decide on a wedding theme, they hire two wedding planners, Taylor and Ben, to compete for the job by proposing two very different styles.

programme.title: The Wedding in the Hamptons
programme.desc: Jenna is a fashion designer who works for her friends boutique. Their failing business was saved by a famous influencer. When Jenna comes to a lavish Hamptons wedding, she was mistaken for her, but she decides to go along to save business

programme.title: The Marry Me Pact
programme.desc: Charlotte and Rory are best friends, and for his 30th he goes travelling around the world. A year later, Charlotte visits a psychic who tells her she is destined to be with Rory when he gets home. Rory comes home...but engaged.

programme.title: Two Chefs and a Wedding Cake
programme.desc: It follows a food critic at the top of her game as she meets a chef renowned for refusing food critics to his restaurant. They must overcome their differences before her sisters wedding
